basics.name: Clinz Stephen
basics.label: Software Engineer | WordPress Expert
basics.summary: Creative and detail-oriented Web Developer with over 5 years of experience specializing in WordPress development, UI/UX customization, and responsive design. Proven ability to build engaging, SEO-optimized, and secure websites aligned with brand identity. Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and theme/plugin customization. Strong background in collaborating with marketing teams, managing multi-tenant WordPress hosting, and delivering visually impactful digital experiences under tight deadlines. Experienced in hosting and configuring websites on AWS, shared hosting environments, and connecting domains using Cloudflare DNS for optimized performance and security.
